title: Quest experience rewards

properties.name: description
properties.value: This page contains a list of quests which gives experience in a specific skill; each skill has its own section displaying the experience given in ascending order.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Quests/Experience rewardsThe RuneScape Classic Wiki also has an article on: classicrsw:Quest experience rewards
This article is about the rewards for all quests. For the F2P rewards, see Quest experience rewards (F2P).

This page contains a list of quests which gives experience in a specific skill; each skill has its own section displaying the experience given in ascending order.

There are also quests that let you choose between different skills, see here.

Set experience[edit | edit source]

This section lists the experience that is given in a specific skill post-quest completion. In addition, this section also shows the skill requirements for the listed quests.

Other[edit | edit source]

  • Observatory Quest - 875 experience in Attack, Strength, Defence, or Hitpoints is a possible reward from completing the quest, depending on the constellation players observe, which is random. Some constellations do not give experience in any skill but give items instead.
  • The Varrock Museum - After completing a specific set of quests, players can speak to Historian Minas to inform him of their endeavours and their discoveries during these quests. Players will receive Kudos in addition to lamps which grant experience in a skill of the player's choosing.

Quests that do not grant any experience rewards[edit | edit source]

This does not include any quests that reward tomes, lamps, or other ways to get experience after the quest has been completed, but where the quest itself does not have a direct experience reward.

  • Tale of the Righteous
  • The Corsair Curse
  • Bone Voyage
  • Throne of Miscellenia
  • Troll Stronghold
  • Rune Mysteries
  • Sheep Herder
  • Clock Tower
  • Family Crest
  • Merlin's Crystal
  • Lost City
  • Pirate's Treasure
  • Black Knights' Fortress
  • Prince Ali Rescue
  • Ernest the Chicken
  • Shield of Arrav
  • Romeo & Juliet
  • Demon Slayer
  • Recipe for Disaster/Another Cook's Quest

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The Waterfall Quest grants the most experience for any quest with no requirements, allowing a player to level up both their Attack and Strength from level 1 to level 30.

See also[edit | edit source]

  • Quest experience rewards (F2P) (experience rewards page for free to play quests)
  • Quest skill requirements (skill levels required to begin or complete quests)
  • Experience (experience table from levels 1 to 99)

It is recommended putting such experience rewards on skills that are slow or expensive to train, such as [[Runecraft]], [[Agility]], [[Construction]], or [[Herblore]]. {{SkillChoice|Any}} ==Other== *[[Observatory Quest]] - 875 experience in [[Attack]], [[Strength]], [[Defence]], or [[Hitpoints]] is a possible reward from completing the quest, depending on the constellation players observe, which is random. Some constellations do not give experience in any skill but give items instead. *The [[Varrock Museum]] - After completing a specific set of quests, players can speak to [[Historian Minas]] to inform him of their endeavours and their discoveries during these quests. Players will receive [[Kudos]] in addition to lamps which grant experience in a skill of the player's choosing. == Quests that do not grant any experience rewards == This does not include any quests that reward tomes, lamps, or other ways to get experience after the quest has been completed, but where the quest itself does not have a direct experience reward. *[[Tale of the Righteous]] *[[The Corsair Curse]] *[[Bone Voyage]] *[[Throne of Miscellania|Throne of Miscellenia]] *[[Troll Stronghold]] *[[Rune Mysteries]] *[[Sheep Herder]] *[[Clock Tower]] *[[Family Crest]] *[[Merlin's Crystal]] *[[Lost City]] *[[Pirate's Treasure]] *[[Black Knights' Fortress]] *[[Prince Ali Rescue]] *[[Ernest the Chicken]] *[[Shield of Arrav]] *[[Romeo & Juliet]] *[[Demon Slayer]] *[[Recipe for Disaster/Another Cook's Quest]] ==Trivia== *The [[Waterfall Quest]] grants the most [[experience]] for any [[quest]] with no requirements, allowing a player to level up both their [[Attack]] and [[Strength]] from level 1 to level 30. ==See also== *[[Quest experience rewards (F2P)]] (experience rewards page for free to play quests) *[[Quest skill requirements]] ([[Skills|skill]] levels required to begin or complete [[quests]]) *[[Experience]] (experience table from levels 1 to 99) [[Category:Quests]] {{Quests}}
